Ankit Tumuluri

US Citizen

(312)-661-2980

ankit.tumuluri@gmail.com linkedin.com/in/ankit-tumuluri

Education

The Pennsylvania State University - University Park B.S. in Data Sciences

August 2021 – May 2025

Coursework: Data Structures, Data Visualization, Computational Theory, Computer Architecture

Experience

Software Engineer RSQUARE

Monroe, NJ June 2025 – Present ◦ Designed and implemented an analytics-driven dashboard enabling clients to monitor wellness data and

manage preferences, improving data clarity and reducing customer confusion by 20%.

Built a recommendation engine using Python and SQL that synthesized 10+ user health data points to deliver personalized fitness plans.

Optimized data pipelines and reduced AI response latency by 30%, enabling faster data queries and improv- ing user experience.

LLM Training Expert Scale AI

Remote October 2024 – May 2025 ◦ Applied data-driven evaluation methods to refine text-to-speech and NLP models for a Microsoft-backed

video game project.

Conducted QA and data validation on AI model outputs, maintaining 98%+ accuracy while processing high-volume datasets.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve model quality and enhance player engagement metrics.

Projects

Sales Performance Dashboard — SQL, Tableau, Excel

Analyzed 3 years of sales data (50+ stores) with SQL queries and Excel for KPI reporting. ◦ Built an interactive Tableau dashboard highlighting trends by region, product category, and seasonality. ◦ Identified a 15% revenue growth opportunity by surfacing underperforming regions.

NBA Shot Charts — Python, Pandas, Matplotlib

Collected and cleaned 100k+ rows of NBA stats via the NBA API. ◦ Built regression models to predict player scoring averages with 87% accuracy. ◦ Visualized player trends and shot charts to support decision-making for analysts and fans.

Customer Churn Analysis — SQL, Tableau

Examined a telecom dataset of 10,000+ users to identify churn drivers by demographics and contract type. ◦ Created SQL queries to segment customers and calculated churn KPIs. ◦ Developed a Tableau dashboard used to recommend retention strategies for at-risk customers.

Skills

Data Tools: SQL (PostgreSQL, SQLite), Excel (pivot tables, advanced formulas), Tableau, Power BI

Programming: Python (pandas, NumPy, matplotlib, seaborn), R

Techniques: Data cleaning, exploratory data analysis (EDA), dashboarding, reporting automation, API inte- gration, Pycharm, Tableau

Other: Git, Docker, AWS, Google Cloud
